import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function ToolInspectionModal() { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const checklistItems = [ "Tool is clean and free from debris", "No cracks, damage, or wear on handles/grips", "Blades/cutting edges are sharp and undamaged (if applicable)", "Power cord is intact (no cuts, exposed wires)", "Plug is undamaged and securely attached", "Safety guards/shields are in place and functional", "Switches and controls work correctly", "Tool operates properly during test (if applicable)", "Battery or power supply functions correctly (if applicable)", "Tool stored safely after inspection", ]; return (
{isOpen && (

Hand and Power Tool Inspection Form

{/* Section 1: General Info */}
{[ "Date of Inspection", "Inspected by", "Location", "Tool Name/Type", "Tool ID or Serial Number (if any)", ].map((label, index) => (
))}
{/* Section 2: Checklist */}

Inspection Checklist

{checklistItems.map((item, i) => ( ))}
# Item to Check ✔ ✘ Comments/Action Needed
{i + 1} {item}
{/* Section 3: Additional Notes */}

Any Issues Identified?
